item.title: Stamp 1
item.infoText: The Inverted Jenny (1918) was accidentally printed with the plane upside down.

item.title: Stamp 2
item.infoText: The Bluenose (1929) is considered to be the most beautiful stamp in the world.

item.title: Stamp 3
item.infoText: The first human spaceflight project in USA.

item.title: Stamp 4
item.infoText: Robert H. Goddard launched his first rocket in March 1926.

item.title: Stamp 5
item.infoText: This beauty, from 1898, marks British possessions in a cheerful red hue.

item.title: Stamp 6
item.infoText: The Columbus stamps were the first commemorative stamps issued by the USA.

item.title: Stamp 7
item.infoText: The Viking Ship was issued in 1925 and features excellent engraving detail.

item.title: Stamp 8
item.infoText: The Graaf Zeppelin stamp was expensive and issued during the Great Depression.

item.title: Stamp 9
item.infoText: The Yacht Issue from 1910 bears the image of the German Kaiser's yacht.

item.title: Stamp 10
item.infoText: Robert Schumanns commemoration stamp features music by Franz Schubert.
